alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 4:08AM EST until March 05 at 11:42AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Sidney. Mad River at Springfield. Scioto River at Circleville. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. Little Miami River at Spring Valley. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Milford. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River at Miamitown. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding occurs downstream of Miamitown in Miami and Whitewater Townships. Lawrenceburg Road is flooded between Miamiview Road and U.S. 50, as well as between suspension Bridge Road and Stephens Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
